ygData.subject: Re: Soul Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, it very well could be.  But I am inclined to believe that he just saw a dark reaver and mistook it for something else... I dunno.  If it does exist that
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, it very well could be. But I am inclined to believe that he just saw a
dark reaver and mistook it for something else... I dunno. If it does exist
that would be very cool... but it might just be another rumor. I have heard
of several other swords with names like sould flayer and other names with
about the same wording. I would like to hear more about how this developes
however.


>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Soul Reaver
>Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 11:47:32 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>
>Today, I was talking to an old friend of mine. He said that he saw someone
>with a sword called a Soul Reaver. It is believed that the Soul Reaver has
>the stats of 20/32. It is also claimed to look similar to the Fiery
>Avenger,
>except that there is a mist surrounding the blade. Does anyone have any
>info
>on it? All of a sudden, my Dark Reaver seems to be swinger slower today . .
>. hehe
>
